participant_1.background:
I love the memories of my senior prom and how happy I was that day.
I like to catch up on my reading about business and finance on a rainy day.
i have depression and anxiety so i don t really go out a lot.
My next challenge is to skydive because I need to keep pushing my limits and I love the adrenaline.
i am a cheerleader.

participant_2.background:
I like to make my own art, so I would like to decorate my baby's nursery with handmade wall art.
going to the beach is my favorite past time.
I like taking my dog to the dog park to meet other dogs and play.
i m a really , really good guitar player.
pizza is my most favorite thing.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing today?
I am doing great! Just got back from the beach. How about you?
Oh, that sounds like fun! I am doing pretty well. I have a lot of plans for the day.
I am going to go skydiving!
Oh my gosh, that sounds amazing! I have always wanted to do that.
It is my next challenge. I love pushing my limits.
I can see why! It sounds like a lot of fun.
It is supposed to be a lot of adrenaline. I am excited to try it out.
I am sure you will have a great time. Let me know how it goes!
